title: Cee-Lo Green and Girlfriend Shani James Have Been Engaged for a Year
text:
Comments The 'F**k You' hitmaker reveals he popped the question to his longtime girlfriend Shani about a year ago when they were at a studio. 
Cee-Lo Green, who has been keeping a low profile on his personal life, has revealed that he has been engaged to longtime girlfriend Shani James for about a year. The couple kept it a secret until now and couldn't help sharing the happy moment when met on the set of his music video "Work". To PEOPLE , the Gnarls Barkley member shared about the moment he proposed, "It was just a typical night at the studio, but then again, not so typical cause I did something extra special, out of the ordinary." "I went and purchased a ring that we had seen together, maybe four or five months or so prior," he continued. "I went back and purchased the ring and I just kind of had it stashed away in some old equipment. And I said, 'Will you reach in there and grab something for me?' " Shani said of the ring, "It was the most beautiful diamond ring I had ever seen in my life. It was lit up by a light." She also recalled how she reacted to the sweet and beautiful surprise, "I said, 'What is that?' He just looked at me and said, 'Well...?' And I was just like 'Oh my goodness.' " She added, "I said, 'Babe, I can't believe it.' He said, 'You've been such a good woman. You're such and amazing person. You're my life partner. You're my best friend. I want to share the rest of my life with you.' " On why they decided not to announce it until now, Cee-Lo said, "Truth be told, it's not something we wanted to promote. We're a collective power together because our private life is sacred. But you know what though, maybe it's time. Maybe it is time for the world to know that I have a very secure situation and a loving woman supporting me the entire way." The former coach of " The Voice " also gushed about his fiancee, "I appreciate her openness and willingness to love unconditionally. She's been so sweet to me through a number of different trials that come to test the resilience of a union to deem whether it's worthy or not, whether it's durable or strong enough." The couple claimed they hadn't begun planning the wedding, but Cee-Lo said he would be actively involved when the time comes. "I'm a pretty hands on person," he said. "We'll be prepared to be spontaneous." Cee-Lo was previously married to Christina Johnson from 2000-2005. They have a son together, 15-year-old Kingston.
